long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is a very specific tool with limited functionality, that only cleans up the website at viewpoint.ca.

All it does is visually hides - but does not even remove - some of the web page elements that normally add Viewpoint flags to the maps, and insert ads in the search results sidebar on the left or in the property page on the right. It cleans up the map and search results to make more items fit in the list, and not so cluttered with VP flags all over the map. It does this by setting their CSS classes to "display: none;" If you do not use viewpoint.ca, this isn't going to be of any use.
